lines.text: n , x , i , j , k , l , s , m = int
lines.code: int n , x , i , j , k , l , s , m ;

lines.text: difficulty = long long int with difficulty = 9999999999999
b = int vector of size n - 1
iterate l , m while l < n - 1
if l is rock increment m
set b [ l ] to a [ m ]
iterate i , k while i < n - 2 set maxx to b [ k ] - ( if b [ i ] > maxx then b [ k ] - b [ i ] else maxx )
lines.code: for ( i = 0 , k = 1 ; i < n - 2 ; i ++ , k ++ ) { maxx = b [ k ] - b [ i ] > maxx ? b [ k ] - b [ i ] : maxx ; }

lines.text: set difficulty to maxx if maxx is less than difficulty else difficulty
